title: [vs17.10] Include Microsoft.Common.Test.targets in Arm64
body:
Backport of #9984 to vs17.10

Fixes AB#2034354

### Summary

Add a file imported by the new Test SDK to ARM64 MSBuild.

### Customer Impact

MSBuild-integrated tests fail on ARM64 VS.

### Regression?

No: this scenario never worked for ARM64.

### Testing

Manual validation and #9984.

### Risk

Very low: adding one file to the ARM64 component manifest.

nodes.body:
Hello! I noticed that you're targeting one of our servicing branches. Please consider updating the version.
